manual/index.html.title: Overview | Dialogue Toolkit | 1.0.0
manual/index.html.keywords: Overview Prerequisites https://github.com/nrvllrgrs/toolkit.core https://github.com/YarnSpinnerTool/YarnSpinner-Unity.git Installing To load as UMP package from a Git URL: Open the project that you plan to use. Go to Window > Package Manager Open the add menu from the Package Manager's toolbar. Select Add package by git URL from the add menu. Enter https://github.com/nrvllrgrs/toolkit.dialogue.git in the textbox. Click Add. Getting Started Config Setup Scene Setup
